name: Standard Colors
description:
All of the great Ozora colors that you love are now Grip colors as well! 

Ozora kendamas are known for their balance and playablility, so it is only fitting that we chose to use them.

All kendamas come in their original Ozora packaging with extra string.

If you already have a tama (ball) and only want to buy the ken (handle) then enter the code TAKETHETAMAOFF during checkout and it will take $10 off your order and the tama (ball) off of your kendama. 

Enjoy!!

name: Rasta Triple Threat Series - Limited Edition
description:
Grip Kendama is proud to introduce the first ever Triple Threat Series!

All three kens share the same line design. The top three stripes of each Grip matches the color of the tama, making each ken one of a kind. 

The Rasta colors green/yellow/red have been a popular choice among kendama players. It only seemed fitting that I chose them for our first Triple Threat Series. 

This is a limited edition series that will never be replicated. Get them while they last!

Enjoy!!

name: IRIE! 1
description:
IRIE is the Jamaican word used to describe a great and powerful feeling. Much like the feeling you will get when your new Grip kendama arrives!

Rasta colors reflect off a marbled center in this custom Grip. 

It is no secret that kendama players love these colors. And I try to make Grips that players will want. There are a couple Rasta options in this initial release, but they will go fast so get them while you can!

Kendama comes in original Ozora packaging with extra string.

Enjoy!!

name: IRIE! 2
description:
IRIE is the Jamaican word used to describe a great and powerful feeling. Much like the feeling you will get when your new Grip kendama arrives!

Rasta colors grow as you look from top down. Finished off by a marble stripe with a few spiral twists. 

It is no secret that kendama players love these colors. And I try to make Grips that players will want. There are a couple Rasta options in this initial release, but they will go fast so get them while you can!

Kendama comes in original Ozora packaging with extra string.

Enjoy!!

name: Black/Yellow Custom
description:
Black and Yellow Black and Yellow Black and Yellow!!!

Grip Kendama is proud to be a Pittsburgh company and I like to show it! The only thing is, every black and yellow kendama that I make, I want to keep! And this one is no exception!

Set up with a woodgrain tama leaving room for even further customization! 

Kendama comes in the original ozora packaging with extra string.

Enjoy!!

name: Rasta Ombre
description:
This Rasta Ombre Grip is a real eye catcher!

There is only one of these available in this first release, but this pattern will be repeated!

Get it while you can!

Comes with original Ozora packaging with extra string.

Enjoy!!

name: Black/Yellow Custom Stripe
description:
Similar to the Triple Threat pattern, but done up in black and yellow. 

No marbling necessary. Let the colors do the talking. 

Kendama comes in original Ozora packaging with extra string.

Enjoy!!

name: Red/Blue/Yellow Ziggy Split
description:
This one-of-a-kind kendama is named "Ziggy" because of the zig zag lines between colors in the Grip. I really like the way this one turned out!

Comes with original Ozora packaging with extra kendama string.

Only 1 made! So what you see is what you get!

Enjoy!!

name: White/Teal/Gray Marble Ziggy Split
description:
Named "Ziggy" because of the zig zag lines between colors in the Grip. I really like the way these look!

Comes with original Ozora packaging with extra string.

Enjoy!!

name: 'Merica
description:
Only for the most patriotic of kendama players!

Comes with original Ozora packaging with extra string.

Enjoy!!

name: Yellow/Multi Marble 50/50
description:
50/50 Kendama tamas became popular when they were originally made by Mugen to show the rotation of the ball on television. 
These made for TV kendamas have become very highly sought after and have also made the 50/50 pattern popular. 

Getting the line perfectly straight in the Grip is a challenge, so there may be a slight variation. 

This 50/50 is very unique because instead of 2 solid colors this has yellow/various colors marbled with yellow.

Kendama comes in original Ozora packaging with extra string.

Enjoy!!

name: White/Black Ombre
description:
The Ombre is one of my favorite Grip designs!

Inspired by the Grayscale blocks on a color chart used for photography, this is a great example of how inspiration can come from anywhere!

This pattern will most definitely be repeated!

Enjoy!!

name: Dark Blue Ombre
description:
The Ombre is one of our favorite patterns that we do!

This Ombre is slightly different from the others because it has a dark stripe at the top as well. 

Inspired by the Grayscale blocks on a color chart used for photography, this is a great example of how inspiration can come from anywhere!

Comes with original Ozora packaging with extra string.

Enjoy!!

name: White/Blue Ombre
description:
The Ombre is one of my favorite Grip designs!

Inspired by the Grayscale blocks on a color chart used for photography, this is a great example of how inspiration can come from anywhere!

Only 1 made! So what you see is what you get!

Comes with original Ozora packaging with extra Kendama string.

Enjoy!!

name: Light Blue/Blue Ombre
description:
The Ombre is one of my favorite Grip designs!

Inspired by the Grayscale blocks on a color chart used for photography, this is a great example of how inspiration can come from anywhere!

name: Green/Purple 50/50
description:
50/50 Kendama tamas became popular when they were originally made by Mugen to show the rotation of the ball on television. 
These made for TV kendamas have become very highly sought after and have also made the 50/50 pattern popular. 

Getting the line perfectly straight in the Grip is a challenge, so there may be a slight variation. 

Kendama comes in original Ozora packaging with extra string.

Enjoy!!

name: Black/Yellow 50/50
description:
50/50 Kendama tamas became popular when they were originally made by Mugen to show the rotation of the ball on television. 
These made for TV kendamas have become very highly sought after and have also made the 50/50 pattern popular. 

Getting the line perfectly straight in the Grip is a challenge, so there may be a slight variation. The kendama shown in the pictures is the one you will receive! Only one currently available!

Kendama comes in original Ozora packaging with extra string.

Enjoy!!

name: Bold Rasta
description:
Sometimes you gotta be Bold.

This kendama will help you do that. 

Be Bold...  Get a Grip!

Kendama comes in original Ozora packaging with extra string.

Enjoy!!

name: Red/White/Blue Spiral
description:
It's a Grip with a twist!

These Spiral Grip Kendamas are wrapped in multiple colors. Each spiral ends up looking different, so each of these are one of a kind by nature.

Comes with original Ozora packaging with extra string.

Enjoy!!

name: Multi Spiral 1
description:
It's a Grip with a twist!

These Spiral Grip Kendamas are wrapped in multiple colors. Each spiral ends up looking different, so each of these are one of a kind by nature.

Comes with original Ozora packaging with extra string.

Enjoy!!

description:
It's a Grip with a twist!

These Spiral Grip Kendamas are wrapped in multiple colors. Each spiral ends up looking different, so each of these are truly one of a kind!

Only 1 made! So what you see is what you get!

Comes in original Ozora packaging with extra kendama string.

Enjoy!!

name: Cloudy Spiral
description:
It's a Grip with a twist!

These Spiral Grip Kendamas are wrapped in multiple colors. Each spiral ends up looking different, so each of these are truly one of a kind.

Only 1 made! So what you see is what you get!

Comes with original Ozora packaging with extra kendama string.

Enjoy!!

name: Marbly
description:
Although the Grip is carved in the standard 6 stripe pattern, there is nothing standard about this Grip. 

2 color marble stripes alternating down this ken make it a real eye catcher. With a woodgrain tama thats ready for play or further customization.

Kendama comes in original Ozora packaging with extra string.

Enjoy!!

name: Multi Marble 1
description:
Yeah a standard color Grip is great, but you are more of the Marble type?

Well I have some Grips for you!

Ok ok, no cheesy used car sales pitches, but these Marble Grips really are cool!

Each one is different and unique, and I couldn't repeat it if I tried!

If you like what you see, get it while you can!

All kendamas come in their original Ozora packaging with extra string.

Enjoy!!

name: Mix-n-Mash 1
description:
The Mix-n-Mash Grip kens are truly unique!

Whenever I am making Grips, I keep a blank one to the side and if I have a little extra rubber, I mash it into the extra blank. When it is all said and done a Mix-n-Mash is what comes out. 

If you like what you see, get it while you can because chances are there will not be another Grip like this!

All kendamas come in original Ozora packaging with extra string.

Enjoy!!

description:

name: White/Light Blue 50/50 Smoosh
description:
50/50 Kendama tamas became popular when they were originally made by Mugen to show the rotation of the ball on television. 
These made for TV kendamas have become very highly sought after and have also made the 50/50 pattern popular. 

Getting the line perfectly straight in the Grip is a challenge, so with this one I didn't worry about it and just "smooshed" it together. 

Kendama comes in original Ozora packaging with extra string.

Enjoy!!

name: The Minimalist
description:
Are you the type of kendama player that is all about function and not so worried about asthetics? If so, then The Minimalist is the Grip for you!

Nothing flashy about this Grip. Just what you need, where you need it.

Kendama comes in original Ozora packaging with extra string.

Enjoy!!
